title: Bonus Episode - Charles Ray Finch
description:
February 18, 2019 / Colin talks with the attorneys for Charles Ray Finch about his actual innocence and how listeners can help set him free. 

 Link to Finch's petition: https://www.change.org/p/governor-roy-cooper-pardon-charles-ray-finch-a2fe9ebd-2830-48b0-aa05-496a44e9551e
